spec_data.Name: erlang-merge_index
spec_data.Description:
MergeIndex is an Erlang library for storing ordered sets on disk. It is very
similar to an SSTable (in Google's Bigtable) or an HFile (in Hadoop).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 03:47:00 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: An Erlang library for storing ordered sets on disk
